Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Diwan, Daintree Wilderness Lodge is in a rural location and within the vicinity of Daintree Discovery Centre and Daintree Wild Zoo. This lodge is within the region of Daintree Village and Cape Tribulation.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 7 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions along with DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a spa tub or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.

Dining
A complimentary full breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
A complimentary full breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as a spa tub or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.
Make yourself at home in one of the 7 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions along with DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Located in Diwan, Daintree Wilderness Lodge is in a rural location and within the vicinity of Daintree Discovery Centre and Daintree Wild Zoo. This lodge is within the region of Daintree Village and Cape Tribulation.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Daintree Discovery Centre - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Daintree Wild Zoo - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Daintree Village - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Cape Tribulation - 16.5 km / 10.2 mi
Daintree National Park - 18.6 km / 11.5 mi
Mossman Gorge Center - 29.7 km / 18.5 mi
Mossman Gorge - 30 km / 18.6 mi

The preferred airport for Daintree Wilderness Lodge is Cairns, QLD (CNS-Cairns Intl.) - 82.4 km / 51.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
